column1: Master of Science in Sport and Performance Psychology
column5: The sport and performance psychology (SPP) program at University of Western States (UWS) provides students with the skills in positive and applied sport psychology needed to enhance performance and maximize human potential. The program offers a Master of Science degree as well as a doctoral degree. The Master of Science program transfers seamlessly into the doctoral program should a student wish to continue on after completing the master’s level.
column7: $587 U.S. per credit hour - 54 credits total - as of Fall 2022
